name: Solitude Maze
description:
A big room for a small creature. A puzzle platformer that will change your perspective on boxes, switches, buttons and rotating environment.

W A S D, to Move
E to interact
Space to Jump

Credits:

Lutt Ferreira - Game Design, Level Design and Pixel Art

Arlam Junior - Game Design, Music and Sound Effects

João Bertolino - Game Design and Programming
